comments.body: I wonder if this belongs in Material somehow.

I think we use Material in too many places. container:true is relatively heavy-duty, I don't think we want to make it automatic when you insert a new material layer. Might be worth looking at in more detail in a subsequent patch, though.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +97,101 @@        },
        child: new Semantics(
          container: true,
          child: new Material(
            elevation: 6,
